definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: III. [[זמר]] (√ of foll.; mng. dub.; DHM in MV:10, 983 comp. Ar. d-ma0run thing to be protected, thing sacred, inviolable, Lane:978, Sab. [[דַמר]] protect; Aram. damer wonder at, admire, dmiyro0 mirus, admirabilis, etc.; hence [[זמרת]] Ge 43:11 ‘die Merkwürdigkeiten des Landes’).
